name: CORONA (moossy23)
description:
This game was inspired by Dr Mario.

Seeing how the world is currently plagued by the ever spreading Coronavirus, this is just a lighthearted game that puts two people against each other to see who will emerge victorious -- the pills or the virus.

Player 1:

- Control the pill using the Left and Right Arrow Key

- Beat the virus by hitting it with 4 pills 

Player 2:

- Control the virus using the A and D Key

- Avoid the pills for a minute and survive

Credits: 
Music: Ben Sound Royalty Free Music - Psychedelic

Font : Doctor
